mapper.select: SELECT MENU_CODE, MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE, CATEGORY_CODE, ORDERABLE_STATUS FROM TBL_MENU WHERE ORDERABLE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT MENU_CODE, MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE, CATEGORY_CODE, ORDERABLE_STATUS FROM TBL_MENU WHERE ORDERABLE_STATUS = 'Y' AND MENU_CODE = #{ code }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MENU( MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE, CATEGORY_CODE, ORDERABLE_STATUS ) VALUES ( #{ name }, #{ price }, #{ categoryCode }, 'Y' )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_MENU WHERE MENU_CODE = #{ code }
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MENU SET MENU_NAME = #{name}, MENU_PRICE = #{price}, CATEGORY_CODE = #{categoryCode}, ORDERABLE_STATUS = #{orderableStatus} WHERE MENU_CODE = #{code}
